https://registrar.umd.edu/grades-records: Constituent Relations Services | Student Information The Office of the University Registrar supports the university with the production of ID cards and handles student requests to update personal information with the university. Change of Personal Information Students can use Testudo's My Profile to update some of their personal information. For changes that require supporting documentation, students should request an update through the Office of the University Registrar. [Learn more](/grades-records/student-information/change-personal-information)University ID Cards University of Maryland photo identification (ID) cards are used for accessing campus programs and services. [Learn more](/grades-records/student-information/university-id-cards)
